english.segment1: You promised me. That Youd never leave. Or let me go. You promised me. That Youd love me through. The highs and lows
english.segment2: You promised me. You wont give me more. Than I can bear. You promised me. That when I cry out. That Youd be there
english.segment3: The shadowlands are what I know. So Im hanging on to Your every word. The shadowlands surround me now. But You walk with me through the cloud. Into the sun. Into the sun
english.segment4: You promised me. If I sow in tears. Ill reap in joy. You promised me. That You will breathe life. Into my soul
english.segment5: I know its true. All that You say. I believe in You. And I am standing on. The promises Youve made
english.segment6: You promised me and I believe.
